actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: To amend the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to authorize appropriations to purchase, process, and distribute milk to States for distribution to needy persons in situations of emergency and distress.
short_title: Hunger Prevention and Nutrition Assistance Act of 1991

summary.text: Hunger Prevention and Nutrition Assistance Act of 1991 - Amends the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to authorize additional appropriations for each of FY 1992 through 1996 for the purchase and distribution of milk and milk products.

titles.title: Hunger Prevention and Nutrition Assistance Act of 1991

To amend the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to authorize appropriations to purchase, process, and distribute milk to States for distribution to needy persons in situations of emergency and distress.
